GK19bahcar2u:1: atimbhīre bhūpe kūpa iva janasya niravatārasya /
GK19bahcar2u:3: rāgiṇi naline lakṣmīṃ divaso nidadhāti dinakaraprabhavām /
GK19bahcar2u:22: pratyagranirjitasyāstamupagatavato vasantasāmantasya bālāpatyeṣviva payaḥpāyiṣu navodyāneṣu darśitasneho mṛdurabhūt /
GK19bahcar2u:31: aśiśirasamayena cakravākamithunābhinanditāḥ sarita iva tanimānamānīyanta soḍupāḥ śarvaryaḥ /
GK19bahcar2u:68: śirālā iva tṛṇaveṇīvikaraṇaiḥ ucchmaśrava iva dhūyamānanavayavaśūkaśakalaśaṅkubhiḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:100: svamapi dhūmamambhodasamudbhūtibhiyeva bhakṣayantaḥ satilāhutaya iva sphuṭad bahalabālakīṭapaṭalāḥ kakṣeṣu,
GK19bahcar2u:107: tathābhūte ca tasminnatyūgre grīṣmasamaye kadācidasya svagṛhāvasthitasya bhuktavato
GK19bahcar2u:111: bhavatāmantikaṃ prajñātatamo dīrghādhvagaḥ prahito dvāramadhyāste' iti /
GK19bahcar2u:123: viśrāntaścābravīt--“eṣa khalu svāminā mānanīyasya lekhaḥ prahitaḥ' iti vimucyā rpayat /
GK19bahcar2u:124: bāṇastu sādaraṃ gṛhītvā svayamevāvācayat--“mekhalakātsaṃdiṣṭamvadhārya phalapratibandhī dhīmatā pariharaṇīyaḥ kālātipāta ityetāvadatrārthajātam
GK19bahcar2u:127: mekhalakastvavādīt--“evamāha medhāvinaṃ svāmī--jānātyeva mānyo yathaikagotratā vā,
GK19bahcar2u:138: tvayi tu vinā kāraṇenādṛṣṭe 'pi pratyāsanne bandhāviva baddhapakṣapātaṃ kimapisnihyati me hṛdayaṃ dūrasthe 'pīndoriva kumudākare /
GK19bahcar2u:139: yato bhavantamantareṇānyathā cānyathā cāyaṃ cakravartī durjanairgrāhita āsīt /
GK19bahcar2u:140: na ca tattathānasantyeva te yeṣāṃ satāmapi satāṃ na vidyante mitrodāsīnaśatravaḥ /
GK19bahcar2u:143: salilānīva gatānugatikāni lolāni khalu bhavantyavivekināṃ manāṃsi /
GK19bahcar2u:146: vijñaptaścakravartī tvadartham-yathā prāyeṇa prathame vayasi sarvaṃsyaiva cāpalaiḥ śaiśavamaparādhoti /
GK19bahcar2u:150: na ca sevārvaṣamyaviṣādinā parameśvaropasarpaṇabhīruṇā vā bhavatā bhavitavyam /
GK19bahcar2u:151: yato yadyapi-- svecchopajātaviṣayo 'pi na yāti vaktuṃ dehauti mārgaṇaśataiśca dadāti duḥkham /
GK19bahcar2u:185: śrutvā ca tameva candrasenaṃ samādiśat--“kṛtakaśipuṃ viśrāntasukhinamenaṃ kāraya' iti /
GK19bahcar2u:188: saṃghaṭṭamānaraktapaṅkajasaṃpuṭapīyamāna eva kṣayiṇi kṣāmatāṃ vrajati bālavāyasāsyāruṇe 'parāhṇātape,
GK19bahcar2u:190: puraḥ parāpatati preṅkhadandhakāraleśalambālake śaśivirahaśokaśyāma iva śyāmāmukhe,
GK19bahcar2u:198: na ca me tatra pūrvajapuruṣapravartitā prītiḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:219: prāsthānikāni sūktāni mantrapadāni ca bahuśaḥ samāvartya devadevasya virūpākṣasya
GK19bahcar2u:230: pituḥ kanīyasyā svasrā mātreva snehārdrahṛdayayā śvetavāsasā sākṣādiva bhagavatyā mahāśvetayā mālatyākhyayā kṛtasakalagamanamaṅgalaḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:245: tatra ca hṛdayanirviśeṣeṇa bhrātrā suhṛdā ca jagatpatināmnā saṃpāditasaparyaḥ sukhamavasat /
GK19bahcar2u:246: athāparedyuruttīrya bhagavatīṃ bhāgīrathīṃ yaṣṭigṛhakanāmni vanagrāmake niśāmanayat /
GK19bahcar2u:249: nivartitasnānāśanavyatikaro viśrāntaśca mekhalakena saha yāmamātrāvaśeṣe divase bhuktavati
GK19bahcar2u:250: bhūbhuji prakhyātānāṃ kṣitibhujāṃ bahūñśibirasaṃni veśānvīkṣamāṇaḥ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GK19bahcar2u:268: vivasvataḥ pratāpamāpibadbhirivātapaṃ candralokamayamiva jīvalokaṃ janayadbhiḥ kumudamayamiva
GK19bahcar2u:283: ārabhyamāṇāpūrvaniśamiva mahānīlamayūkhāndhakāraiḥ syandamānānekakālindīsahasramiva gāruḍamaṇiprabhāpratānaiḥ aṅgārakitamiva puṣparāgaraśmibhiḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:291: adya bhaviṣyati bhuktvā sthāne dāsyati darśanaṃ parameśvaraḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:292: niṣpatiṣyati vā bāhyāṃ kakṣām' iti darśanāśayā divasaṃ nayadbhirbhujanirjitaiḥ śatrumahāsāmantaiḥ samantādāsevyamānam,
GK19bahcar2u:301: abhavaccāsya jātavismayasya manasi--“kathamivedamiyatpramāṇaṃ prāṇijātaṃ janayatāṃ prajāsṛjāṃ nāsītpariśramaḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:307: mekhalakastu dūrādeva dvārapalalokena pratyabhijñāyamānaḥ “tiṣṭhatu tāvatkṣaṇamātramatraiva puṇyabāgī' iti tamabhidhāyāpratihataḥ puraḥ prāviśat
GK19bahcar2u:315: “kathayataṃ yadi somavaṃśasaṃbhavaḥ sūryavaśasaṃbhavo vā bhūpatirabhūdevaṃvidhaḥ' iti praṣṭumānītābhyāṃ somasūryābhyāmiva śravaṇagatābhyāṃ maṇikuṇḍalābyāṃ
GK19bahcar2u:316: vahadvadanalāvaṇyavisaraveṇikākṣipyamāṇairadhikāragauravāddīyamānamāgerṇeva dinakṛtaḥ kiraṇaiḥ prasādalabdhayā vikacapuṇḍarokamuṇḍamālayeva dīrghayā dṛṣṭyā dūrādevānandayatā,
GK19bahcar2u:320: itareṇāpanītataralatāṃ tāḍinīmiva latāṃ śāta kaumbhīṃ vetrayaṣṭimunmṛṣṭāṃ dhārayatā
GK19bahcar2u:324: dauvārikastu samupasṛtya kṛtapraṇāmo madhurayā girā savinayamabhāṣata-- “āgacchata /
GK19bahcar2u:328: yadevamanugrāhyaṃ māṃ devo manyate' ityuktvā tenopadiśyamānamārgaḥ prāviśadabhyantaram /
GK19bahcar2u:356: dūrvārasaśyāmalaphenalavaśabalān daśanagṛhītamuktān pharapharitatvacaḥ kaṇḍūjuṣaḥ pradeśān prajālayadbhiḥ,
GK19bahcar2u:370: āśāmukhavisarpiṇā bakulavanānāmiva vikasatāmāmodeva limpantaṃ ghrāṇendriyaṃ dūrādavyaktamibhadhiṣṇyāgāramapaśyat /
GK19bahcar2u:372: asāvakathayat--“eṣa khalu devasyaupavāhyo vāhyaṃ hṛdayaṃ jātyantarita ātmā bahiścarāḥ prāṇā vikramakrīḍāsuhṛddarpaśāta iti yathārthanāmā vāraṇapatiḥ
GK19bahcar2u:375: śrūyate darpaśātaḥ yadyevamadoṣo vā paśyāmi tāvadvāraṇendrameva /
GK19bahcar2u:382: gatvā ca taṃ pradeśaṃ dūrādeva gabhbhīragalagarjitairviyati cātakakadambakairbhuvi ca bhavananīlakaṇṭhakulaiḥ kalakekākalakalamukharamukhaiḥ
GK19bahcar2u:398: visarpantyā ca dantakāṇḍayugalasya kāntyā saraḥkrīḍāsvā ditāni kumudavanānīva bahudhā vamantam,
GK19bahcar2u:402: hastakāṇḍadaṇḍoddharaṇalīlāsu ca lakṣyamāṇena raktāṃśukasukumāratareṇa tālunā kavalitāni raktapajhavanānīva varṣantam,
GK19bahcar2u:405: cūtacampakalavalīlavaṅgakakkolavantyelālatāmiśritāni sasahakārāṇi karpūrapūritāni pārijātakavanānīvopabhukāni punaḥpuna karaṭābhyāṃ bahalamadāmodavyājena
GK19bahcar2u:409: muhurmuhuḥ sthagitāpāvṛtadiṅmukhābyāṃ karṇatālatālavṛntābhyāṃ vījayantamiva bhartṛbhaktyā dantaparyaṅkikāsthitāṃ rājalakṣmīm,
GK19bahcar2u:410: āyatavaṃśakramāgatena gajādhipatyacihnena cāmareṇeva calatā vāladhinā virājamānam,
GK19bahcar2u:411: svacchaśiśiraśīkaracchalena digvijayapītāḥ sarita iva punaḥpunarmukhena muñcantam,
GK19bahcar2u:478: vindhyasya dantāvādivarāhasya karaḥ' iti vismayamānamevaṃ dauvāriko 'bravīt-- “paśya,
GK19bahcar2u:479: -- mityaivālikhitāṃ manorathaśatairniḥśeṣanaṣṭāṃ priyaṃ cintāsādhanakalpanākuladhiyāṃ bhūyo vane vidviṣām /
GK19bahcar2u:480: āyātaḥ kathamapyayaṃ smṛtipathaṃ śūnyībhavaccetasāṃ nāgendraḥ sahate na mānasagatānāśāgajendrānapi //
GK19bahcar2u:483: paśya tāvaddevam' ityabhidhīyamānaśca tena madajalapaṅkilakapolapaṭṭapatitāṃ mattāmiva
GK19bahcar2u:484: madaparimalena mukulitāṃ kathamapi tasmād dṛṣṭimākṛṣya tenaiva dauvārikeṇopadiśyamānavartmā
GK19bahcar2u:485: samatikramya bhūpālakulasahasrasaṃkṛlāni trīṇi kakṣāntarāṇi caturthe muktāsthānamaṇḍapasya
GK19bahcar2u:487: dūrādūrdhvasthitena prāṃśūnā karṇikāragaureṇa vyāyāmavyāyatavapuṣā śastriṇā maulena śarīraparivārakalokena paṅktisthitena kārtasvarastambhamaṇḍaleneva
GK19bahcar2u:489: haricandanarasaprakṣālite tuṣāraśīkaraśītalatale dantapāṇḍurapāde śaśimaya iva muktāśailaśilāpaṭṭaśayane samupaviṣṭam,
GK19bahcar2u:491: diṅmukhavisarpiṇi dehaprabhāvitāne vitatamaṇimayūkhe gharmasamayasubhage sarasīva mṛdumṛṇālajālajaṭilajale sarājakaṃ ramamāṇam,
GK19bahcar2u:498: sakalabhūpālaparityaktena bhīteneva labdhavācā sarvātmanā satyena sevyamānam,
GK19bahcar2u:505: nijapratibimbānyapi nṛpacakracūḍāmaṇidhṛtānyasahamānamivadarpaduḥkhāsikayā cāmarānilanibhena bahudheva śvasantīṃ rājalakṣmīṃ dadhānam,
GK19bahcar2u:507: ābharaṇamaṇikiraṇaprabhājālajāyamānānīndradhanuḥsahasrāṇīndraprābhṛtaprahitāni vilabhamānamiva rājñāṃ saṃbhāṣaṇeṣu parityaktamapi madhu varṣaṃntam,
GK19bahcar2u:510: prasādeṣu niścalāmapi śriyaṃ śthāne śthāne śthāpayantam,
GK19bahcar2u:515: agocare guṇānāmabhūmau saubhāgyānāmaviṣaye varapradānānāmaśakya āśiṣāmamārge manorathānāmatidūre daivasyādiśyupamānānāmasādhye dharmasyādṛṣṭapūrve lakṣmyā mahattve sthitam,
GK19bahcar2u:517: bhāsvadbimbādhareṇa prasannāvalokitena candramukhena kṛṣṇakeśena vapuṣā sarvadevatāvatāramivaikatra darśayantam,
GK19bahcar2u:518: api ca māṃsalamayūkhamālāmalinitamahītale mahati mahārhe māṇikyamālāmaṇḍitamekhale mahānīlamaye pādapīṭhe kalikālaśirasīva salīlaṃ vinyastavāmacaraṇam,
GK19bahcar2u:520: kṣaumapāṇḍureṇa caraṇanakhadodhitipratānena prasaratā mahīṃ mahādevīpaṭṭabandheneva mahimānamāropayantam,
GK19bahcar2u:529: amṛtaphenapiṇḍapāṇḍunā mekhalāmaṇimayūkhakhacitena nitambabimbavyāsaṅginā vimalapayodhautena netrasūtraniveśaśobhinādharavāsasā vāsukinirmokeṇeva mandaraṃ dyotamānam,
GK19bahcar2u:539: sodaryalakṣmīcumbanalobhena kaustubhamaṇeriva mukhāvayavatāṃ gatasyādharasya galatā rāgeṇa pārijātapallavaraseneva siñcantaṃ diṅmukhāni,
GK19bahcar2u:540: antarāntarā suhṛtparihāsasmitaiḥ prakīryamāṇavimaladaśanaśikhāpratānaiḥ prakṛtimūḍhāyārājaśriyāḥ prajñālokamiva darśayantam,
GK19bahcar2u:546: vimalakapolaphalakapratibimbatāṃ cāmaragrāhiṇīṃ vigrahiṇīmiva mukhanivāsinīṃ sarasvatīṃ dadhānam,
GK19bahcar2u:550: utphullamālatīmayena rājalakṣmayāḥ kacagrahalīlālagnena nakhajyotsnāvalayeneva mukhaśaśipariveṣamaṇḍalena muṇḍamālāguṇena parikalitakeśāntam,
GK19bahcar2u:551: śikhaṇḍābharaṇabhuvā muktāphalālokena marakatamaṇikiraṇakalāpena cānyonyasaṃvalanavṛjinena prayāgapravāhaveṇikāvāriṇevāgatya svayamabhiṣicyamānam,
GK19bahcar2u:566: anavaratakarakalitakoṇatayā cātmanaḥ priyāṃ vīṇāmiva śriyamapi śikṣayantam,
GK19bahcar2u:615: dṛṣṭvā cānugṛhīta iva nigṛhīta iva sābhilāṣa iva tṛpta iva romāñcamucā mukhena muñcannānandabāṣpavāribindūndūrādeva vismayasmeraḥ samacintayat--“so 'yaṃ sujanmā,
GK19bahcar2u:624: na śatakratoriva gautravināśapiśunāḥ pravādāḥ na yamasyevātivallabhāni daṇḍagrahaṇāni,
GK19bahcar2u:647: athottare nātidūre rājadhiṣṇyasya gajaparicārako madhuramaparavakramucceragāyat-- “karikalabha vimuñca lolatāṃ cara vinayavratamānatānanaḥ /
GK19bahcar2u:649: rājā tu tacchru tvā dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ giriguhāgatasiṃhabṛṃhitagambhīreṇa svareṇa pūrayanniva nabhobhāgamapṛcchat--“eṣa sa bāṇaḥ?' iti /
GK19bahcar2u:651: so 'yam' iti vijñāpito dauvārikeṇa “na tāvadenamakṛtaprasādaḥ paśyāmi' iti tiryaṅnīladhavalāṃśukadhārāṃ
GK19bahcar2u:653: preṣṭhasya pṛṣṭhato niṣaṇṇasya mālavarājasūnorakathayat--“mahānayaṃ bhujaṅgaḥ' iti /
GK19bahcar2u:654: tūṣṇīṃbhāvena tvagamitanarendravacasi tasminmūke ca rājaloke muhūrtamiva tūṣṇīṃ sthitvā bāṇo vyajñāpayat--“deva/
GK19bahcar2u:671: idānīṃ tu sugata iva śāntamanasi manāviva kartari varṇāśramavyavasthānāṃ samavartinīva
GK19bahcar2u:672: ca sākṣāddaṇḍabhṛti deve śāsati saptāmburāśiraśanāśeṣadvīpamālinīṃ mahīṃ ka ivāviśaṅkaḥ
GK19bahcar2u:678: śarāravo 'pi sānukrośā iva śvāpadagaṇāḥ piśitāni bhuñjate /
GK19bahcar2u:679: sarvathā kālena māṃ jñāsyati svāmī svayameva /
GK19bahcar2u:680: anapācīnacittavṛttigrāhiṇyo hi bhavanti prajñāvatāṃ prakṛtayaḥ' ityabhidhāya tūṣṇīmabhūt /
GK19bahcar2u:684: astābhilāṣiṇi ca lambamāne savitari visarjitarājaloko 'bhyantaraṃ prāviśat /
GK19bahcar2u:686: āstācalakūṭakirīṭe niculamañjarībhāṃsi tejāṃsi muñcati viyanmuci marīcimālini,
GK19bahcar2u:689: divasavihṛtipratyāgataṃ prasrutastanaṃ stanandhaye dhayati dhenuvargamudgatakṣoraṃ kṣudhitatarṇakavrāte,
GK19bahcar2u:690: krameṇa cāstadharādharadhātudhunīpūraplāvita iva lohitāya mānamahasi majjati sandhyāsindhupānapātre pātaṅge maṇḍale,
GK19bahcar2u:692: yajñapātrapavitrapāṇau prakīrṇabarhiṣyuttejasi jātavedasi havīṃṣi vaṣaṭkurvanti yāyajūkajane,
GK19bahcar2u:700: jaranmahiṣamaṣīmalīmasatamasi janitapuṇyajana prajāgare vijṛmbhamāṇe bhīṣaṇatame tamīmukhe,
GK19bahcar2u:705: viralobhavati varaṭānāṃ veśantaśāyinīnāṃ mañjuni mañjīraśiñjitajaḍe jalpite,
GK19bahcar2u:707: bhāvivāsaravījāṅkuranikara iva ca vikīryamāṇe jagati pradīpaprakare nivāsasthānamagāt /
GK19bahcar2u:710: yadyahamakṣigataḥ syām na me darśanena prasādaṃ kuryāt /
GK19bahcar2u:712: upadiśanti hi vinayamanurūpapratipattyupapādanena vācā vināpi bhartavyānāṃ svāminaḥ /
GK19bahcar2u:713: api ca ghiṅmāṃ svadoṣāndhamānasamanādarapīḍitamevamatiguṇavati rājanyanyathā cānyathā ca cintayantam /
GK19bahcar2u:715: yathā yathāvasthitaṃ jānāti māmayaṃ kālena' ityevamavadhārya cāparedyurniṣkramya kaṭakātsuhṛdāṃ bāndhavānāṃ ca bhavaneṣu tāvadatiṣṭhat,
GK19bahcar2u:718: svalpaireva cāhobhiḥ paramaprītena prasādajanmano mānasya premṇo visrambhasya draviṇasya narmaṇaḥ prabhāvasya ca parāṃ koṭimānīyata narendreṇeti
GK19bahcar2u:719: iti śrīmahākavibāṇabhaṭṭakṛte harṣañcarite rājadarśanaṃ nāma dvitīya ucchvāsaḥ /
